gb.deck: Help the little town of El Cadron, Texas, to survive an alien invasion. By controlling four cameras mounted with guns, you are their last hope in this interactive movie in which no playthrough is ever the same.

igdb.name: Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III - Rebel Strike

gb.aliases: Star Wars: Rogue Squadron 3 - Rebel Strike
gb.deck: The sequel to Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader. For the first time in the Rouge Squadron series, Rebel Strike lets the player leave their spaceships, and take on the empire by foot.

extraDataFull.name: Star Wars Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike

gb.deck: Bomberman (also known as Bomberman DS) is the first Bomberman game for the Nintendo DS.
Naruto Clash of Ninja is the first of the Naruto Clash of ninja games.It includes 8 playable characters (and 2 unlockables) from the Naruto anime.

gb.aliases: Tom Sawyer no Bouken , Tom Sawyer no Bouken
gb.deck: Take control of Tom Sawyer and save Becky from Injun Joe.

NES game based on the movie franchise of the same name. This game features a top-down view in which Marty McFly moves through four key moments in the past in order to fix the future, and get back home to 1985.

gb.aliases: Zelda Musou, Hyrule Warriors Legends, Hyrule Warriors: Definitive Edition, Zelda Musou: Hyrule All-Stars, Zelda Musou: Hyrule All-Stars DX
gb.deck: Omega Force, Team Ninja and Nintendo team up for this crossover between the Zelda franchise and the long-running Warriors hack-n-slash series. The game pits Link and friends against hordes of familiar enemies in the signature Warriors fashion.
gb.platforms: Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS eShop, Wii U, Nintendo Switch

gb.deck: The first game in the Namco Museum franchise was released in 1997 for the PlayStation, and includes a variety of Namco arcade games.
gb.platforms: PlayStation, PlayStation Network (PS3), PlayStation Network (PSP), PlayStation Network (Vita)

gb.deck: Hop in an armored tank and wage war with strategic ground tactics - or take to the skies and dogfight against modern jets and bi-planes.  Crush your enemies!
NBA 2K is the first in a series of realistic basketball games (of the same name), bringing a customizable 1999/2000 basketball season to the Dreamcast.
Be awakened from the dead and fight to save Gallowmere from the evil Zarok.
gb.platforms: PlayStation Portable, PlayStation Network (PSP), PlayStation Network (Vita)

gb.deck: Race against the crazy characters from the Sonic universe in insane action platforming levels with loads of power ups.
Take the fight against the Helghast to the small screen in Killzone: Liberation for the PSP.
gb.platforms: PlayStation Portable, PlayStation Network (PSP), PlayStation Network (Vita)

gb.deck: The Getaway is a sandbox crime game set in London.
Classic first-person arena shooting crosses paths with fast-paced third-person melee combat in this unique Xbox-exclusive spin-off of Unreal Tournament 2004.

gb.deck: Star Wars: Obi-Wan puts the player in control of Obi-wan Kenobi as a padawan. The game starts in the events leading up to Episode 1, and continues into the events in Episode 1 itself.
The sequel to Amped, Amped 2 is a snowboarding game similar to the Tony Hawk games.

gb.deck: This sequel to the critically acclaimed Okami returns players to the land of Nippon as the adorably pint-sized, yet still powerful Chibiterasu on a quest to save the land from certain doom at the hands of demons.

gb.aliases: Seiken Densetsu DS: Children of Mana
gb.deck: A DS entry in Square Enix's Mana series with a greater focus on multiplayer.

gb.aliases: Akumajō Dracula: Gallery of Labyrinth, Devil's Castle Dracula: Gallery of Labyrinth
gb.deck: Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin is the second Castlevania entry for the Nintendo DS, extending the story of the 20th century heirs to the Vampire Killer whip (the Morris family) while introducing the new Partner System.
A Columns for the Game Gear. Was even later released on the Coleco Sonic.
Tempo is a platformer for the Sega 32X. It was developed by Red Company and published by Sega in 1995.
Jurassic Park for Sega CD, Released in 1993.  Point & Click style exploring game.
Motocross Championship is a motocross racing game for the Sega 32X.
Cosmic Carnage is a 2-D fighting game that pits fugitive prisoners versus soldiers on a damaged ship in space.
Twisted Metal III is a vehicular combat game, and the third game in the Twisted Metal franchise.

extraData: Sony PlayStation multitap compatible title - 4 players

details: Sony PlayStation multitap compatible title - 4 players

igdb.name: Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II - Rogue Leader

gb.deck: Star Wars Rogue Leader: Rogue Squadron II was a sequel to the first Rogue Squadron on the Nintendo 64 and featured an expanded roster of playable ships, varied environments, and cutting edge graphics.

extraDataFull.name: Star Wars Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader

gb.aliases: X-treme Racing SSX, Extreme Racing SSX, エクストリーム・レーシング SSX
gb.deck: Snowboard Supercross (SSX) is the ground-breaking PS2 launch title from EA Canada. It helped pave the way for many similar "extreme" sports games.

igdb.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD

gb.deck: A remastered HD upgrade of the acclaimed Nintendo GameCube classic sporting sharper visuals, gameplay tweaks and various new features tailored to the Wii U hardware.

extraDataFull.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD

gb.aliases: FFXII: AW, FFXII, Final Fantasy 12: Revenant Wings
gb.deck: Final Fantasy XII: Revenant Wings continues the adventures of Vaan and Penelo as they start their careers as real sky pirates. Rather than using the gambit system from FF XII or the classic turn based system, Revenant Wings plays like a real time strategy game built for the DS.

Perfect Dark Zero is the prequel to the critically-acclaimed futuristic first-person shooter, Perfect Dark. You play the role of bounty hunter Joanna Dark, uncovering conspiracies about the dataDyne Corporation.

extraData: Xbox 360 game backward compatible with Xbox One - Also included as part of the Rare Replay collection of games

gb.deck: The latest main installment of Turn 10's racing franchise, released in Fall 2011.  It features 16 player online races, dynamic race conditions, cars from over 80 manufacturers, and compatibility with Kinect, both on and off the racetrack.
Turn 10's third installment in the Forza series. Forza Motorsport 3 offers 100 tracks and 400 cars with full customization, as well as video editing and uploading.
Nuts & Bolts takes the platformer series in a wild new direction, as Banjo and Kazooie return to battle Gruntilda using unique, player-customized vehicles.

gb.deck: Crackdown 2 is the sequel to the popular open-world supercop game. Players return to Pacific City, where rampaging mutants and gangs vie for control of the streets.  The sequel adds four-player co-op along with competitive multiplayer.

gb.deck: Set in a far-flung, mech-filled future, Titanfall is the first first-person shooter built by Respawn Entertainment, the studio formed by ex-employees of Call of Duty developer Infinity Ward.

Eight months after the events of Halo 4, the Master Chief has reunited with his former SPARTAN-II comrades. After they go AWOL, a team of SPARTAN-IVs known as Fireteam Osiris is assigned to hunt them down.

Halo Wars is a real-time strategy game for the Xbox 360. Join the Halo Wars crew on the UNSC ship CFV-88 Spirit of Fire and engage the Covenant head-on in an attempt to hold on to the recently taken human colony of Harvest. All Units!
gb.platforms: Xbox 360, Xbox 360 Games Store, PC, Xbox One

gb.deck: Halo: Reach is the prequel to Halo: Combat Evolved, and chronicles one of the most cataclysmic events of the Halo Universe, the destruction of the UNSC fortress world Reach, through the eyes of a squad of Spartan super-soldiers known as Noble Team.

extraData: Xbox 360 game backward compatible with Xbox One - Remastered version is in development for Halo: The Master Chief Collection via downloadable content

gb.deck: The first game in the second trilogy of the Halo sci-fi series has the Master Chief awakening from cryostasis (four years after the events of the previous trilogy) as he explores the mysterious Forerunner shield world Requiem, fights a newly-formed Covenant group, and accidentally awakens an ancient evil.

gb.deck: Follow Daxter, Jak's wise cracking and often obnoxious sidekick, as he tries to free Jak following his capture by Baron Praxis after their arrival in Haven City.
The sequel to Project Gotham Racing introduced online play and a plethora of content, while still maintaining its focus on driving with style.

gb.deck: Red Steel was one of the initial First Person Shooters available for the Wii at the system's launch, and one of the first games to make significant use of the Wii's motion-sensitive hardware.

Twenty five years have passed since the decimation of the Locust & Lambent threats on the planet Sera. However a new race of monsters have taken their place and JD Fenix, son of series protagonist Marcus Fenix, has taken up the mantle in helping to protect humanity.

The third and final installment in the Marcus Fenix trilogy. Taking place on the apocalyptic planet Sera, 18 months after the ending of Gears of War 2, players will once again take control of C.O.G. soldier Marcus Fenix as he takes on the Locust threat and their Lambent rivals.

extraData: Xbox 360 game backward compatible with Xbox One - Was also available as a bonus with purchase of Gears of War: Ultimate Edition

gb.deck: Join Delta Squad once more in the fight against the Locust Horde, in this "bigger, better and more badass" sequel to the 2006 smash hit.

gb.deck: The Nintendo 64 version of the acclaimed futuristic racing series. This version is a mixture of the original Wipeout and Wipeout XL with full analog control as well as rumble and memory pack options.
The finale to the Metroid Prime trilogy sees its debut on the Wii.

notes: still sealed when I received it

gb.deck: Crash Bandicoot 2: N-Tranced is the sequel to Crash Bandicoot: The Huge Adventure. It is a side-scrolling platformer, and features non-linear level selection.
Help the X-Men take back control of the Danger Room and defeat Magneto.
An action game to coincide with the release of the 1993 movie and the first game based on the franchise. Take control of Dr. Grant and attempt to escape Jurassic Park.
gb.platforms: Amiga, Game Boy, Game Gear, Genesis, Sega Master System, Super Nintendo Entertainment System, Nintendo Entertainment System, PC

gb.deck: College Football's National Championship II is the sequel to College Football's National Championship.

extraDataFull.name: College Football's National Championship II
details: Sega Genesis Team Player compatible title

gb.deck: Chronicle the classic Xbox and Xbox 360 adventures of the Master Chief with a compilation of the first four main chronological installments of the Halo series, enhanced for the Xbox One with updated graphics and easy access to every multiplayer mode in the series' history.

One of PC gaming's most proficient multiplayer-focused first-person shooters gets completely revamped, adding a new lineup of weapons, characters, game modes, and arenas. Along with more-detailed graphics, this installment adds two new gameplay mechanics: double jumping and the "Adrenaline" system.
Players compete in a multitude of games from water craft races to hot potato with a bomb, all the while collecting points to use in the winner-takes-all final round!

extraData: Xbox game plays on Xbox One - Available via Game Pass

extraDataFull.name: Fuzion Frenzy
details: Xbox game plays on Xbox One - Available via Game Pass

special.value: Xbox game plays on Xbox 360
Xbox game plays on Xbox One - Available via Game Pass

gb.deck: A 2D racing game developed by Rockstar North with unicycles which pick up speed by performing stunts and jumps. Some levels require a set amount of points by performing stunts in a limited time.
Frequency is a music-rhythm game for the PlayStation 2. It is the predecessor to Amplitude and is Harmonix's first game in their long lineage of console rhythm games.

gb.aliases: Human Grand Prix: The New Generation
gb.deck: F1 Pole Position 64 was based on the 1996 Formula One season and thus featured the full roster of drivers and tracks.

igdb.name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U

gb.aliases: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U, SSB4, Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS, Super Smash Bros 4
gb.deck: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS/Wii U is the first cross-platform iteration of the franchise, and features connectivity functionalities between the two versions of the game. While each version has unique modes and a distinct set of stages based on handheld or console games respectively, the character roster is the same across both versions.

extraDataFull.name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U

gb.deck: This Nintendo Wii U game lets players make their own levels based on four different Super Mario Bros. games, with a deep level of customization and built-in level sharing systems to let other players enjoy their work.
The Super Mario Bros. 2-cast of Mario, Luigi, Toad and Peach returns for their first 3D adventure with local multiplayer support. And cat suits. In HD.

A reimagining of the original Star Fox 64 adventure with a focus on the asymmetric action of piloting a vehicle and battling foes at the same time with an independent view. Features a mix of new and familiar locations with all new missions and gameplay elements.

A prototype project developed by Nintendo EAD under Shigeru Miyamoto and demoed at E3 2014. Players survey twelve security cameras on the TV screen to defend against robot attackers in a tower-defense style game viewed on the Wii U GamePad. The game was later turned into a Star Fox-themed game and sold digitally as a stand alone game or packaged with Star Fox Zero.

A collection of twelve not-so-mini-games for up to five players and built specifically around the asymmetric gameplay opportunities enabled by the Wii U GamePad, featuring theme park attractions recalling classic Nintendo franchises.

igdb.name: Mario & Sonic at the Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games

gb.deck: A new game in the Mario and Sonic Olympic Games franchise.

extraDataFull.name: Mario & Sonic at the Sochi 2014 Olympic Winter Games

igdb.name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD

gb.deck: Twilight Princess gets an HD remaster mainly based on the GameCube version with many added features including amiibo support, a new challenge cave, and several gameplay tweaks.

notes: Still have original retail box and Wolf Link Amiibo that came packaged.

extraDataFull.name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess HD

gb.deck: Wipeout Pure is the seventh game in the Wipeout series and the first game in the franchise on a portable system.
Metal Head is a mech combat game created exclusively for the Sega 32X.

The second installment in Sega's licensed football series following Sportstalk Football '93. The title was changed to the simpler NFL Football '94. Football '94 was endorsed by both the NFL and the NFLPA, as such the game contained over 800 players from all 28 teams based on the 1992 season.
General Chaos is a satirical military arcade strategy game that blends War Games with a bit of Hogan's Heroes.

igdb.name: Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon

gb.deck: Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon is a shooter in which you pilot the Millennium Falcon and other space crafts as you battle the forces of the Empire.

extraDataFull.name: Star Wars: Flight of the Falcon

gb.deck: Race patrons around the city at break-neck speeds in your taxi.
An updated version of Mortal Kombat 4 which was supposed to be more authentic to the orginal arcade version. Six characters were added to this version of the game.

Super Smash Bros. Melee refines the N64 original's unique platform-based fighting, adding more characters, stages, items and mechanics to the mix. Melee also features significantly expanded single player content, most notably the brand new Adventure Mode taking players through several unique levels based on various Nintendo properties.

While vacationing on tropical Isle Delfino, Mario is framed for vandalism committed by his own shadowy doppelganger, forcing the paroled plumber to clean up the entire island by using a specialized water-spraying device known as F.L.U.D.D.
Mario and company tee it up at the Mushroom Kingdom in Mario Golf: Toadstool Tour, which marks the first appearance of Mario Golf on the GameCube.
Mario Party 6 is the sixth game in the Mario Party franchise. It introduces several new aspects, such as Orbs, a day and night cycle, and the new characters Brighton and Twila.

Mario Kart: Double Dash!! is the fourth installment in the Mario Kart series, following Mario Kart: Super Circuit from 2001. The game introduced a number of new gameplay features, most notably the inclusion of two riders per kart.

igdb.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

gb.aliases: Zelda no Densetsu: Kaze no Takt, Zelda no Densetsu: Kaze no Takuto, ゼルダの伝説 風のタクト, TWW
gb.deck: The first entry in the Zelda franchise for the GameCube, sporting a distinctive cel-shaded graphics style. It built upon the mechanics of Ocarina of Time and Majora's Mask, and its oceanic setting emphasized exploration.

extraDataFull.name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker

gb.deck: F-Zero GX is a futuristic racing game developed by AV & SEGA and published by Nintendo and is a sequel to the long-running F-Zero franchise. It is considered the most challenging F-Zero game to date.
Polarium is a puzzle game for the Nintendo DS where players use the stylus to draw lines that flip tiles, changing them from black to white and vice versa.
Help Mickey and Minnie save Alice in Wonderland from the evil clutches of Maleficent in this punishing platformer for the NES.

Little Nemo is based on a film based on a comic strip from the early 20th century. In it, a young boy from London named Nemo is summoned to the kingdom of Slumberland; a fantasy realm filled with strange creatures and dream-like locations.

gb.aliases: GoW, Gears of War: Ultimate Edition, GoW: Ultimate Edition
gb.deck: Gears of War is a tactical cover-based sci-fi shooter from Epic Games. The player controls Marcus Fenix, a COG soldier who fights the Locust aliens defending their home planet from the encroaching Human invaders.
gb.platforms: Xbox 360, Xbox 360 Games Store, PC, Xbox One

gb.deck: The third game in the Fable series sets you with the task of overthrowing your own brother, the tyrant ruler of Albion, as the kingdom enters the industrial era.

gb.deck: Jet Set Radio Future is set in a futuristic Tokyo. The follows a gang of J-pop inspired skaters and their efforts to fight an oppressive regime with music, urban mischief and spray-paint while beating off rival gangs.

gb.deck: SOCOM 3 is the third game in the successful series for the PS2 that pushed online play to new heights.

gb.aliases: Everybody's Golf 3, Minna no Golf 3, MinGol 3
gb.deck: The first PlayStation 2 entry in the Hot Shots Golf series.

igdb.name: Heroes of Might and Magic: Quest for the Dragon Bone Staff

gb.deck: The first and only console entry in the revered PC strategy series is, despite the name, a remake of King's Bounty, which preceded the Heroes series by a few years.

extraDataFull.name: Heroes of Might and Magic: Quest for the Dragon Bone Staff

gb.deck: Guitar Hero allows players to step into the shoes of a rock god and play some of the most famous guitar songs of all time.
Buzz! is a trivia game that puts the player in a fictional game show .
Amplitude is a music/rhythm game and is the sequel to 2001's Frequency. Like its predecessor, players play songs by hitting notes on multiple tracks representing each instrument found in the song.
This sequel to Wii Sports offers 12 different games with multiple variants for most of them.
Packaged with the Wii (except Japan), Wii Sports allows players to compete with friends in tennis, bowling, boxing, baseball, and golf.

gb.aliases: SSBB, Dairantô Sumasshu Burazâzu ekkusu, Great Melee Smash Brothers X, Project M
gb.deck: Strap on your fighting shoes and get ready to brawl in the first  Smash Bros. game for the Wii.

igdb.name: Star Wars: The Clone Wars – Lightsaber Duels

gb.deck: Based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars film, players can take control of their favorite Jedi and battle it out on the Wii.

extraDataFull.name: Star Wars The Clone Wars: Lightsaber Duels

gb.deck: The eighth iteration in the series brings the party to the Nintendo Wii. Mario Party 8 is one of the best-selling Wii games, selling over 4.86 million units worldwide.
Get online and race in this Wii update of the long-running Mario Kart series. Mario Kart Wii is one of the best-selling games on the Nintendo Wii. It is the eighth installment of the series.

gb.aliases: Link no Bowgun Training, リンクのボウガントレーニング
gb.deck: Learn to use the Wii Zapper as you control Link and his crossbow in this Legend of Zelda spin-off. This minigame shooter collection is part of the Wii Zapper pack.

igdb.name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword

gb.aliases: Zelda no Densetsu: Skyward Sword, ゼルダの伝説 スカイウォードソード
gb.deck: Link descends from his floating continent home to explore the dark and dangerous world below with the help of a magical sword, in this Wii/Wii U instalment of the Legend of Zelda series.

extraDataFull.name: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword

gb.deck: Oswald the Rabbit and Mickey Mouse battle it out in Warren Spector's re-imagining of Walt Disney's universe in Epic Mickey.

A Wii-exclusive motion-based rhythm game where fictional music bands (of different genres) fight for dominance. Features a dynamic music system where the genre can change completely at different points in the song.
Perfect Dark is a first-person shooter for the Nintendo 64 and the spiritual successor to the 1997 smash hit GoldenEye 007.
gb.platforms: Nintendo 64, Game Boy Color, Xbox 360 Games Store

gb.deck: Enjoy barrel blasting, special powers, and saving the Kongs from King K. Rool in the Nintendo 64 installment of the Donkey Kong series.

A first-person shooter for the Nintendo 64 and a video game tie-in with the 1995 James Bond film GoldenEye. It paved the way for a long line of shooter games based on the universe of the British secret agent and is often credited for helping establish first-person shooters for consoles.
